Articles.Content:
A mod originally created as a stock part by Mrbrownce, edited by me.

FL-C2000 tank uses 2500 units of fuel instead of 500, 5 times as much fuel. Full weight: 4, empty weight: 1.0.

[mod]Sorry Stallar, but this is not a mod, it's not even a config edit as you didn't provide anything, take a look around the addon forums if you want to lean to make stuff Also this thread isn't going to go anywhere.[/mod]
